item.title: Venera add a quote by Bernard M. Baruch
item.description: "Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter, and those who matter don't mind." -- Bernard M. Baruch

item.title: Venera add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "Don't cry because it's over, smile because it happened." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Venera add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "I like nonsense, it wakes up the brain cells. Fantasy is a necessary ingredient in living." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Venera add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description:
"Passion makes a person stop eating, sleeping, working, feeling at peace. A lot of people are frightened because, when it appears, it demolishes all the old things it finds in its path.
No one wants their life thrown into chaos. That is why a lot of people keep that threat under control, and are somehow capable of sustaining a house or a structure that is already rotten. They are the engineers of the superseded.
Other people think exactly the opposite: they surrender themselves without a second thought, hoping to find in passion the solutions to all their problems. They make the other person responsible for their happiness and blame them for their possible unhappiness. They are either euphoric because something marvelous has happened or depressed because something unexpected has just ruined everything.
Keeping passion at bay or surrendering blindly to it - which of these two attitudes is the least destructive?
I don't know." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Venera add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "And, when you want something, all the universe conspires in helping you to achieve it." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Venera add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "There is only one thing that makes a dream impossible to achieve: the fear of failure." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Venera add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "Everything tells me that I am about to make a wrong decision, but making mistakes is just part of life. What does the world want of me? Does it want me to take no risks, to go back to where I came from because I didn't have the courage to say "yes" to life?" -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Venera add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "Life always waits for some crisis to occur before revealing itself at its most brilliant." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Venera add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "You have to take risks, he said. We will only understand the miracle of life fully when we allow the unexpected to happen. Every day, God gives us the sun--and also one moment in which we have the ability to change everything that makes us unhappy. Every day, we try to pretend that we haven't perceived that moment, that it doesn't exist--that today is the same as yesterday and will be the same as tomorrow. But if people really pay attention to their everyday lives, they will discover that magic moment. It may arrive in the instant when we are doing something mundane, like putting our front-door key in the lock; it may lie hidden in the quiet that follows the lunch hour or in the thousand and one things that all seem the same to us. But that moment exists--a moment when all the power of the stars becomes a part of us and enables us to perform miracles." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Venera add a quote by Thomas Fuller
item.description: "It is said that the darkest hour of the night comes just before the dawn." -- Thomas Fuller

item.title: Venera add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "Of all the ways we have found to hurt ourselves, the worse has been through love. We are always suffering because of someone who doesn't love us, or someone who has left us, or someone who won't leave us. If we are alone, it is because no one wants us..." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Venera add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "When I had nothing to lose, I had everything. When I stopped being who I am, I found myself." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Venera add a quote by Terry Pratchett
item.description: "The trouble with having an open mind, of course, is that people will insist on coming along and trying to put things in it." -- Terry Pratchett

item.title: Venera add a quote by Neil Gaiman
item.description: "Have you ever been in love? Horrible isn't it? It makes you so vulnerable. It opens your chest and it opens up your heart and it means that someone can get inside you and mess you up." -- Neil Gaiman

item.title: Venera add a quote by Neil Gaiman
item.description: "Sometimes you wake up. Sometimes the fall kills you. And sometimes, when you fall, you fly." -- Neil Gaiman

item.title: Venera add a quote by Neil Gaiman
item.description: "Life is a disease: sexually transmitted, and invariably fatal." -- Neil Gaiman

item.title: Venera add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "You know you're in love when you can't fall asleep because reality is finally better than your dreams." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Venera add a quote by Jeffrey Eugenides
item.description: "The essential matrimonial facts: that to be happy you have to find variety in repetition; that to go forward you have to come back to where you begin." -- Jeffrey Eugenides

item.title: Venera add a quote by Nora Roberts
item.description: "Damn me to hell or take me to heaven, but for Gods sake, do it now...." -- Nora Roberts

item.title: Venera add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Two things are infinite: the universe and human stupidity; and I'm not sure about the universe." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Venera add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "That which does not kill us makes us stronger." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Venera add a quote by Fyodor Dostoevsky
item.description: "What is hell? I maintain that it is the suffering of being unable to love." -- Fyodor Dostoevsky

item.title: Venera add a quote by Martin Luther King Jr.
item.description: "Our lives begin to end the day we become silent about things that matter." -- Martin Luther King Jr.

item.title: Venera add a quote by Dorothy Parker
item.description: "I don't know much about being a millionaire, but I'll bet I'd be darling at it." -- Dorothy Parker

item.title: Venera add a quote by Narcotics Anonymous
item.description: "Insanity is doing the same thing, over and over again, but expecting different results." -- Narcotics Anonymous

item.title: Venera add a quote by Theodore Roosevelt
item.description: "Do what you can, with what you have, where you are." -- Theodore Roosevelt

item.title: Venera add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Logic will get you from A to Z; imagination will get you everywhere." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Venera add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "It is not a lack of love, but a lack of friendship that makes unhappy marriages." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Venera add a quote by Paul Terry
item.description: "Whenever I feel the need to exercise, I lie down until it goes away." -- Paul Terry

item.title: Venera add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description: "It is one of the blessings of old friends that you can afford to be stupid with them." -- Ralph Waldo Emerson
